item.title: “MAGRITTE CITY TRIP" STAYING IN A B&B
item.body:
Discover the Surrealist Brussels of Magritte during your stay discovering the Capital of Europe while staying in a B&B.
A new museum dedicated to the works of Magritte opened in the Place Royale, in the centre of Brussels in June 2009. Magritte's house and studio in the suburb of Jette are also open to the public, and include an exhibition of over 400 works of art and biographical documents. A visit to Magritte's studio in Jette, where, over almost 25 years, he produced almost half his total output, is included in this package.

From € 50 per person.
To book this package, simply choose your B&B from the Bed & Brussels website and then select the Magritte package at €20 per person during the booking process.

This package includes:
- One night in a Bed & Brussels B&B.
- Priority entry tickets to the Magritte Museum (Place Royale).
- Entry ticket to René Magritte House Museum at Jette.
- Entry ticket to René Magritte studio at Jette.
- information about activities on the theme of Surrealism in Brussels (e.g. guided tours).

How to find and reserve your B&B on the Bed & Brussels website

item.title: BEER AND CHOCOLATE PACKAGE IN A GUEST ROOM
item.body:
Belgium is the land of beer and chocolate and that's why we offer you this combined package.

You'll visit the Cantillon Brewery and learn all about Gueuze, Kriek and many other beers brewed on the spot. At the end of the visit (35-45 min.) you can sample different beers.

If you love Belgian chocolate, you have to go to the Cocoa and Chocolate museum near the Grand Place. For 35 to 40 minutes you take a journey in discovery of our famous delicacy!
All inclusive rate from € 49.50 per person based on double occupancy.
Booking this package is easy: choose your guest room on the Bed & Brussels website; during the reservation procedure the purchase of this package will be suggested to you.

This package includes:
- One night in a guest room.
- Breakfast.
- Ticket for the Chocolate museum with sampling.
- Ticket for the Cantillon brewery and sampling.
- Map of the city.

Children younger than 12 accompanied by their parents: free of charge.
How to search for and book at Bed & Brussels

item.title: “CHOCOLATE WEEKEND” PACKAGE AT THE MARIVAUX HOTEL, CONGRESS & SEMINAR CENTRE BRUSSELS
item.body:
Chocolate symbolises pleasure, luxury and fun! The Hotel Marivaux in Brussels combines all three in this package at the heart of the city of chocolate!
Let yourself be taken over by a passion for chocolate in the luxurious surroundings of the Hotel Marivaux.
Comfort, space and relaxation are the key words for describing the elegant rooms at the Marivaux, which have been carefully chosen for you. The hotel will present you with a free box of chocolates to enable you to make the most of your stay.
Give in to your dreams, to pleasure and to delighting your tastebuds during a very chocolatey weekend at the Hotel Marivaux.

€ 80 per person (including taxes), based on two people sharing a double room.

This package includes:

- 1 night in double room
- Free upgrade to a "Club"-category room (subject to availability)
- Breakfast
- Welcome cup of hot chocolate, served in the "Meat Me" brasserie on arrival.
- Surprise box of chocolates in room on arrival.
- 2 free entry tickets to the Cocoa and Chocolate Museum.
- 3-course set-menu dinner (drinks not included) served in the "Meat Me" brasserie.
- Free WiFi internet access.

item.title: "ROMANCE" PACKAGE AT THE MARIVAUX HOTEL, CONGRESS & SEMINAR CENTRE BRUSSELS
item.body:
Every day is a day for celebrating love!
The Marivaux Hotels welcomes you for romantic mini-breaks throughout the year.
€ 92.50 per person (based on two people sharing a double room) so package price for two is € 185.

This package includes:

- One night in a double room.
- Breakfast.
- Bottle of Champagne in your room on arrival.
- Free massage oil and perfume to create a romantic atmosphere.
- Late check-out (2pm)
- Free car-parking service.

item.title: CITYBREAK IN BRUSSEL MET DE JEUGDHERBERG GÉNÉRATION EUROPE
"A GREEN WALK IN BRUSSELS" IN HET STANHOPE HOTEL
LA DEMENCE & ROYAL WINDSOR HOTEL GRAND PLACE
item.body:
Come to La Demence and stay at the recommended Royal Windsor Hotel Grand'Place, conveniently located in the heart of Brussels!
1 night from € 99
Code: DEME
2 nights from € 89 per night.
Code: DEM2
3 nights from € 79 per night.
Code: DEM1

Code: DEM3
Night + La Demence presale ticket.
Code: DEM4

5 accommodation options including:

- Double or single occupancy.
- Welcome drink.
- Late check-out (4 pm).
- Access to the Fitness Centre & Sauna.
Offer valid upon availability.
VAt and services included.

For more information on La Demence, visit the website www.lademence.com

item.title: "TIME FOR EUROPE" AT THE CROWNE PLAZA BRUSSELS - LE PALACE
item.body:
The Crowne Plaza Brussels - le Palace offers a way to discover Brussels, the capital of Belgium and the headquarters of the European Union and Nato. Visit in a comfortable way the most famous buildings where the most important decisions are taken all year long.
From € 52 per person, for one night (based on two people sharing a double room).

This package includes:
- One night in an Standard-category room.
- Delicious buffet breakfast.
- Full documentation on the European district including a walk trail
- One day travel card with the underground
- Drink with French fries at the bar before dinner .

Subject to availability.

item.title: "THE AGE OF ART NOUVEAU" PACKAGE AT THE CROWNE PLAZA BRUSSELS - LE PALACE
item.body:
The Crowne Plaza Brussels - Le Palace offers you an unusual way of discovering Brussels, capital of Europe and of Art Nouveau.
On the one hand, you can enjoy different tourist circuits, by car, on foot or by bicycle, to explore, district by district, the city's Art Nouveau architecture.
On the other hand, you can visit the interiors of Art Nouveau buildings (e.g. villas, private houses, schools and businesses), which are not usually open to the public, which will be accessible to the holders of a special pass.

Price from € 68.50 per person, for a one-night stay (price based on two people sharing a double room).

This package includes:
- One night in a Century-category room.
- Delicious buffet breakfast.
- Three-course set-menu meal in the Nouveau Taste restaurant (drinks not included).
- A small Nouveau Style souvenir.
- A complete set of documents on Brussels and on Art Nouveau, including an Art Nouveau walking map.

Subject to availability.

item.title: "SOME TIME FOR MUSEUMS" PACKAGE AT THE CROWNE PLAZA BRUSSELS - LE PALACE
item.body:
Come and discover the world's largest collection of works of art by René Magritte, displayed in over 2,500m². The doors of the Magritte Museum will be opened for you!
The museum's displays make the most of René Magritte's works and its displays cover all the periods of his life. The works of art on display, which include some of his most important masterpieces, were mainly bequeathed by Irène Scutenaire-Hamoir and Georgette Magritte. Others were purchased by the Royal Fine Arts Museum from other sellers.

From € 61 per person, for one night (based on two people sharing a double room).

This package includes:
- One night in an Executive-category room
- Buffet breakfast
- Welcome drink at the hotel's bar.
- One-day public transport ticket.
- Entry ticket to Magritte Museum.
- Box of chocolates in room on arrival.

Subject to availability

item.title: "SWEET BRUSSELS" PACKAGE AT MARTIN'S CENTRAL PARK
item.body:
Enjoy a different taste of Brussels! Martin's Central Park offers you a tasty mini-break at the heart of the capital of Europe.
Price from € 54.50 per person.
Package only available for two people sharing a double room on a Saturday or Sunday or during Belgian school holidays.
Subject to availability.

This package includes:
- One night in a Great-category double room
- Access to the hotel's sauna and fitness room
- Buffet breakfast
- A delicious glass of Belgian beer served in the Icones lounge bar.
- A Brussels waffle and a cup of hot chocolate served at the Café du Vaudeville, one of the best cafés in the city, located a short walk from the Grand'Place.

item.title: "MAGRITTE" PACKAGE AT MARTIN'S CENTRAL PARK
item.body:
Stay at the heart of Brussels and discover the Magritte Museum with Martin's Central Park.
Dedicated to the work of one of Europe's greatest painters, the Magritte Museum invites you to admire the largest collection of works of art by René Magritte in the world.
Price from € 119 per person for two nights.
Package available all year on Saturdays, Sundays and during Belgian school holidays.
Subject to availability and based on two people sharing a double room.

This package includes:
- Two nights in a Great-category double room.
- Buffet breakfast.
- Entry ticket to the Magritte Museum.

The Magritte Museum is open from Tuesday to Sunday from 10am to 5pm.
Late-night opening on Wednesdays until 8pm
In 2011, the museum will be closed from 1 to 31 January and on 1 May, 1 and 11 November and 25 December.

item.title: "ICONES - THE ART OF DINING" PACKAGE AT MARTIN'S CENTRAL PARK
item.body:
Martin's Central Park offers you a tasty package at the heart of Brussels.
You will stay in a spacious, luxurious Great-category double room and you will enjoy a three-course dinner at our ICONES restaurant.
Price from € 89.50 per person, base on two people sharing a double room.
Package only available for two people sharing a double room.

This package includes:
- One night in a double Great-category room.
- Buffet breakfast.
- Three-course dinner at the Icones restaurant, including apéritif and coffee (excluding other drinks).

Validity period: Package available on Saturdays, Sundays and during Belgian school holidays only (excluding from 21 July to 21 August 2011 and from 22 December 2011 to 3 January 2012, when the Icones restaurant is closed).
Subject to availability.
Extra night available at € 45 per person (for room and breakfast only).

item.title: TIME FOR COMICS - CROWNE PLAZA BRUSSELS - LE PALACE
item.body:
Brussels is the Comics capital and the Crowne Plaza Brussels - le Palace offers you a stay to learn all about the ninth Art.
This package includes a ticket for the Belgian Comic Strip Center, a 4,000 m² comics universe.
Your stay is also the perfect opportunity to admire the comic walls all over the city.

From € 58 per person, for one night (based on two people sharing a double room).

This package includes:
- One night in a standard room, breakfast buffet included
- Full documentation about Brussels & Comics, including a walk trail
- One day travel card with the underground
- Entrance to the comics museum
- Drink with French fries at the bar before dinner.

Subject to availability.

item.title: TIME FOR EACH OTHER - CROWNE PLAZA BRUSSELS - LE PALACE
item.body:
You don't really need an excuse for treating yourself to a romantic escapade with your heart's desire in our beautiful city of Brussels.
Live for the present and enjoy the memories of this mini-break afterwards! Celebrate your love with rose petals, candlelight and champagne at Le Palace.

From € 76 per person, for one night (based on two people sharing a double room).

This package includes:
- One night in an Standard-category room.
- Delicious buffet breakfast.
- Bottle of champagne and chocolates in your room on arrival.
- Candle-lit three-course dinner (drinks not included).

Subject to availability.

item.title: Hotel Amigo - A Christmas Celebration
item.body:
Valid from 17th Dec - 8th Jan 2012
Enjoy a night of luxury with a bottle of Champagne, a Christmas welcome amenity and breakfast in the Restaurant or in your room.

•     Minimum 1 night stay
•     Daily breakfast for two adults
•     Bottle of Champagne to enjoy anywhere in the property
•     Complimentary welcome Christmas amenities

The rate is based on one or two people sharing and includes a full breakfast for every day of your stay and a Bottle of Champagne per room per stay to enjoy anywhere in the hotel. The rate also includes complimentary use of the hotel's leisure facilities (where applicable).

Please note the number of rooms and suites sold with this offer is limited and is available only on selected room types. Black out date applies on the 31st December.
 
http://www.hotelamigo.com/offers-and-packages/christmas-family-experience

item.title: Hotel Amigo - Christmas Family Experience
item.body:
Unwrap a luxury Christmas with Rocco Forte Hotels - children stay with our compliment.

Valid from 17th Dec - 8th Jan 2012

Rate description

At Rocco Forte Hotels, families will enjoy all the excitement, fun and warmth of the festive season and a Christmas celebration to remember. This year, parents can relax in the knowledge that their children are having a truly memorable time. Designed to capture the true spirit of Christmas holidays, the Christmas Family Experience package features traditional decorations, delicious food, surprise gifts plus a sprinkling of winter magic. Children staying during the month of December can look forward to a fun-filled stay. Families will find plenty to keep them entertained during their stay, with separate kids’ room featuring a variety of games and DVDs to suit all ages. Mum and Dad can slip away to enjoy award-winning restaurants or relax in luxurious spas, and all with the charms of an exciting European city just footsteps away. Rocco Forte Hotels are set in some of Europe’s most beautiful destinations, home to bustling festive markets, thrilling winter events, as well as a wealth of fascinating sights.

This package includes:
•     Two interconnecting or adjacent rooms (complimentary room for the kids. Maximum of 2 kids under 16 years old)
•     Daily breakfast for two adults and two kids
•     Complimentary food and beverages for children under 3 years of age
•     50% discount on all menus for children under 12 years of age
•     Christmas tree in the main bedroom *
•     Delicacies and personalised present from Santa Claus for every kid
•     Activities for kids on December 24th
•     Special children’s bathing products, bathrobe and slippers
•     Selection of Wii games and DVDs
•     Complimentary access to our fitness centre

*Valid for certain categories of suites sonly
 
http://www.hotelamigo.com/offers-and-packages/christmas-family-experience

item.title: Hotel Amigo - European Christmas Escapes
item.body:
Valid from 17th Dec - 8th Jan 2012

Whether you are seeking peace, quiet and the chance to unwind, or an exciting city break for the latest cultural events and stylish shopping, our European Christmas Escapes package will provide everything you need for a truly magical Christmas treat.

Enjoy up to a third off our Bed and Breakfast rate when you book for 2 consecutive nights or more.
•     Book 2 nights or more and receive up to 33% discount on the value of your stay
•     Breakfast is included within the price
•     The promotion will be available on selected room types only and subject to avaibility.

The rate is based on one or two people sharing and includes a full breakfast for every day of your stay. The rate also includes complimentary use of the hotel's leisure facilities (where applicable). Please note the number of rooms and suites sold with this offer is limited and is available only on selected room types.

http://www.hotelamigo.com/offers-and-packages/european-christmas-escapes

item.title: Dolce La Hulpe - Winter Wonders Package
item.body:
Dolce La Hulpe Brussels offers a magical setting for a wonderful Christmas. Festive decorations adorn the hotel, and the aromatic scent of mulled wine permeates the lobby helping to create a festive and warm atmosphere.

This package includes:

• One overnight accommodation
• buffet breakfast for two
• One ''winter wonder'' kit to enjoy the beautiful christmas market of Brussels including : 1 market plan, 1 "Winter Wonders" bag, 1 "Winter Wonders" mug, 2 x 1 hour free at the rink (skate rental included), A "Brusselicious" beer, 2 tickets to the toboggan run, A voucher for € 5 upon purchase of €20, 1 free drink (upon purchase of one drink), An adulte round of the Ferris wheel at child rate, A series of discounts from cultural partners of VISITBRUSSELS (museums, attractions, etc.) (Value 30€)
• Free access to the wellness center, indoor swimming pool, hammam, sauna and fitness room
• Free parking and Wi-fi connection

Valid through 01/01/2012
 
Info and booking

item.title: Bed & Brussels - Winterpack
item.body:
From 25 November 2011 to 1 January 2012

12€ by no. of people

Hailed as ‘Europe's most original Christmas market' by British tour operators, the Christmas Market stretches over two kilometres.

Skating rink measuring 60 metres in length, this rink offers more than 1,000 square metres of ice.

Baroque roundabouts featuring fantasy characters spin round all day, moving their passengers through space and time. The allows visitors to ascend to the skies for a panoramic view of all the illuminations. And the toboggan run gets longer by the year, to prolong people's sliding pleasure.

Amidst all this busy activity, toddlers (and their parents) need to take a break. Which is why Winter Wonders, in collaboration with the Antenne de la Petite Enfance, has set aside a space for those aged 0 to 3 years of age.
 
More info

item.body:

1 market map & 1 bag & 1 mug & 2x1 hour ice skating (including renting of the skates) & 2 tickets
for the ice toboggan track & 1free drink (for 1 paying drink) & 1 adult Big Wheel tour at children rate
& 1 discount booklet for cultural partners of Visit Brussels (museum, attraction …)

item.title: Radisson Blu Royal Hotel Brussels :Winter Wonders
item.body:
Unique and historic surroundings make the Radisson Blu Royal Hotel Brussels the perfect place for a magical getaway in the heart of the city!
A 5-star hotel in the middle of the vibrant city-center, a few steps away from the famous Grand Place, main shopping streets, lively restaurants and bars, but also only 4 walking minutes from the Christmas market and “Winter Wonders”.
This “Winter Wonders” package will fulfill all your Christmas wishes.
One night in a "Design" double room
Breakfast buffet served in PebbleWood Corner
A "Winter Wonders" Kit
  - Discounted price for a ride on the Big Wheel
  - 2 tickets for 1 hour at the ice rink
  - 2 tickets for the Sledge Ride
  - € 5 voucher valuable for every € 20 spent
  - One-free drink with the purchase of a drink at the “Winter Wonders” cafe?
  - A bottle of Brusselicious beer - a bag "Winter Wonders"
  - a mug "Winter Wonders"
  - A map of the “Winter Wonders” market
  - A multitude of discounts from cultural partners of VisitBrussels (museums, attractions...)
Glass of Sparkling is offered per person for every consumed lunch or dinner at the Atrium restaurant. (as from 35EUR p.p. and not valid on 24-dec-11 and 31-dec-11)*
1€ to children in need through World Childhood Foundation www.childhood.org

Prices from 149EUR upon request and availability. Valid from the25 of november 2011 until the 1st of January 2012

Terms and conditions:
- Prices per night based on double occupancy in a standard room
- * Additional Lunch and Dinner can be booked as supplement to this package. Reservations shall be made in advance
 
Info & Booking

item.title: Husa President Park - Winter Wonders package
item.body:
Unforgettable Experience at the Brussels Christmas Market for only 49.50 € per person as from 25/11/2011 until 01/01/2012 (single supplement 49.50 €).

Hailed as ‘Europe’s most original Christmas market’ by British tour operators, the Christmas Market stretches over two kilometres. It includes stalls, chalets, attractions, activities (Ferris wheel, merry-go-rounds, sledding track, ice skating rink, Christmas tree and light show on the Grand-Place) and terraces. People come to enjoy the food and drink, stock up on delicacies for the holiday period or gifts for loved ones, or to buy a souvenir of this excellent event.

As this route is located in the heart of the capital of Europe, visitors can discover the charms of Brussels in winter-time, not to mention the friendliness of its citizens and the numerous seasonal traditions of many other countries and cultures.

The event takes place at the Grand-Place in Brussels and around the Bourse, the Place Sainte-Catherine and the Marché aux Poissons.

Book us now and enjoy a great time in the heart of Europe.

Our package includes:
 •  One overnight stay in double room
 •  Full American buffet breakfast for two people
 •  Free welcome drink upon arrival (served at the BAR)
 •  Late check out at 3pm
 •  Free on-site parking (upon availability)
 •  Free access to fitness area
 •  One Winter Wonders kit including:

  - one bag and one mug
  - one bottle of beer Brusselicious
  - one free drink at the Winter Wonders Café
  - one hour free ice skating for two people (incl. rental of skates)
  - two free tickets for the sledge ride
  - one kids tariff at the Big Wheel for one adult
  - 5 € gift coupon
  - one map of the event including the cultural program

How to get to Winter Wonders from Husa President Park:

By public transport: From North Station take the tram (n° 3 or 4) to Bourse (Stock Exchange).

* Book your extra nights at our Best Available Rate including American Buffet Breakfast
 
Info & Booking
item.address: Blvd du Roi Albert II 44/Koning Albert II Laan 44

item.title: Conrad Brussels Hotel - Christmas delight package
item.body:
Be our guest at Conrad Brussels this winter and discover our brand new Signature Rooms with VIP amenities and late check out, the best way to truly enjoy the Christmas Market and the city of Brussels.

Our package is full of surprise and includes all that you need to discover Brussels. It contains a map of the Christmas Market, a mug “Plaisir d’Hiver” and many vouchers to go shopping in the best boutiques of Avenue Louise.

Indulge in spending time with your loved ones around a magic Champagne and Chocolate testing at the Sablon.

Discover Belgium’s largest Christmas Market and its “Brusselicious” beer; enjoy 2 complimentary hours of fun on the ice skating rink and a run on the Christmas sledge.
 
Info & Booking

Christmas package

The magic of Christmas delights the younger and the older...

item.title: Hilton Brussels Hotel - Christmas delight package
item.body:
Be our guest at the Hilton Brussels City Hotel during the Christmas season and discover our trendy rooms with boutique restaurant and late check out ; the best way to truly enjoy the Christmas Market and the city of Brussels.
 
Our package is full of surprises and includes all you need to discover Brussels on the most pleasant way. Not only it contains a map of the Christmas Market and a mug “Winter Wonder” but also many vouchers to redeem in the coolest boutiques and cultural attractions of the capital.
 
Discover Belgium’s largest Christmas Market and its “Brusselicious” beer; enjoy 2 complimentary hours of fun on the ice skating rink and a run on the Christmas sledge.

item.title: Noël à Bruxelles 61,50 € p.p. au Crowne Plaza Brussels - Le Palace
